courseInfo.title: Water Treatment Plant Operation: Volume 1
courseInfo.desc: This course is designed to train operators to safely and effectively operate and maintain drinking water treatment plants.

courseInfo.title: Water Treatment Plant Operation: Volume 2
courseInfo.desc: This course is designed to train operators to safely and effectively operate and maintain wastewater treatment plants.

courseInfo.title: Water Distribution System Operation and Maintenance
courseInfo.desc: This course is designed to train operators to safely and effectively operate and maintain water distribution systems.

courseInfo.title: Small Water System Operation and Maintenance
courseInfo.desc: This course is designed to train operators to safely and effectively operate and maintain small water systems and treatment plants
